rules.description: FN Command m,l to Option backspace,del
FN Command j,space to Option arrow keys
Use Delete as Move to Trash
Chrome,Safari: exchange ctrl and cmd click
Figma/Sketch: D to move ('drag') instead of Space
Figma/Sketch: E to measure ('exact') instead of Option
Exchange command q,w with ctrl q,w. ctrl q must be held down.
a -> ctrl when held, a when tapped.
spacebar -> cmd when held, spacebar when tapped.
